# CVPlanarPixelBufferInfo_YCbCrPlanar

**Structure**

A structure for describing YCbCr planar buffers.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CVPlanarPixelBufferInfo_YCbCrPlanar
```

## Initializers

- **init()**
- **init(componentInfoY:componentInfoCb:componentInfoCr:)**

## Properties

- **componentInfoCb**: A [doc://com.apple.corevideo/documentation/CoreVideo/CVPlanarComponentInfo] structure containing information on the Cb component of the buffer.
- **componentInfoCr**: A [doc://com.apple.corevideo/documentation/CoreVideo/CVPlanarComponentInfo] structure containing information on the Cr component of the buffer.
- **componentInfoY**: A [doc://com.apple.corevideo/documentation/CoreVideo/CVPlanarComponentInfo] structure containing information on the Y component of the buffer.

## Data Types

- **CVPixelBuffer**: A reference to a Core Video pixel buffer object.
- **CVPixelBufferLockFlags**: The flags to pass to [doc://com.apple.corevideo/documentation/CoreVideo/CVPixelBufferLockBaseAddress(_:_:)] and [doc://com.apple.corevideo/documentation/CoreVideo/CVPixelBufferUnlockBaseAddress(_:_:)].
- **CVPlanarComponentInfo**: A structure for describing planar components.
- **CVPlanarPixelBufferInfo**: A structure for describing planar buffers.
- **CVPlanarPixelBufferInfo_YCbCrBiPlanar**: A structure for describing YCbCr biplanar buffers.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Sendable
